clip.splitTooltip: Split selected clip at current time position

snap.enabledTooltip: Snap enabled - Clips will automatically align to adjacent clip edges and timeline start
snap.disabledTooltip: Snap disabled - Click to enable snap function for automatic clip alignment during drag

feedback.splitImageUnsupported: Image type does not support split function

feedback.splitAudioSupported: Split selected clip at current time position
